attributes.title: Broke my family apart
attributes.review: I wanted to learn more about trumpets and other brass instruments but immediately upon opening the app I was faced with the most shriveled looking apricot I have ever seen. Unfortunately my sister was next to me when this happened and saw my screen before I could turn off my phone. She is only 12. Her screams were unlike anything I had ever heard. While running out of the room with her eyes closed, tears streaming down her face, she ran right into my grandmothers china cabinet and broke every single one of the dishes. My poor grandmother who worked so hard to preserve these precious pieces of family history, fainted immediately. When she collapsed she landed on my dog, spraining his hind leg. My parents are making me pay for the China, my dogs vet bills, and both my grandmaâ€™s and sisters therapy. To afford all of this Iâ€™m working three jobs and am beyond stressed. I have been taking it out on my family whom I resent for blaming me for one small mistake. Iâ€™m distraught from the image of the apricot too! But they donâ€™t think of that. My lifeâ€™s gone to hell, my family canâ€™t be in the same room anymore and my dog canâ€™t walk. I hate this app.

attributes.title: WARNING!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app because why wouldnâ€™t I download something thatâ€™s supports this fabulous president? Throughout using the app I started to get really really cold. I thought it was the vibes coming from the phone so I closed the app. I felt this way for days and I would break out into cold sweats. I was practically bedridden. Turns out I had a very high fever, to the point my mother was worried. On my way to the emergency room every thing outside started to look RED. The sky, the trees, the road, the car, even my tears were red. And it started to feel like there was something creeping into my thoughts. Just awful racist, homophobic, misogynistic, xenophobic thoughts started to crawl into my mind. Which is weird because Iâ€™m black, bi, and a woman who loves learning about other cultures and traveling. Even being in the same space as my own loving mother started to gross me out. I was in the hospital for FIVR DAYS as they tried to find out what was wrong with me. Every time I opened the app the red vision would get worse and the thoughts would intensify, which is weird because the president definitely isnâ€™t any of those awful things

attributes.title: Never again
attributes.review: When I first opened the app I saw this- orange looking thing. Like some Cheeto dipped in nacho cheese. But anyway, the app asked for my location yesterday and I unknowingly said yes. I woke up this morning and my Eastern Automated Attack  Pigeon was missing. As well as my Dinosaur. After a while of crying about that I go to my fridge and see a note from the same guy who had the opening picture on the app. It said â€œlook out your windowâ€. So I did. My dinosaur was strapped to my mailbox. Scary. I took a nap later that evening. When I woke up I got a notification that said â€œAllow â€”- App to access your contacts?â€ I said yes. The next day all of my contacts were missing. And instead weâ€™re replaced with new phone numbers. I called them. They each had the same voice mail â€œSorry Iâ€™m getting a spray tan right now, itâ€™s going to be huge. Call me after my vacation to cHyheeNAughâ€. Then the worst of the worst happened. I got a notification saying â€œYou won a ticket to the next rallyâ€. I screamed, cried, and finally deleted the app. Never again. Wouldnâ€™t recommend unless you want your prize bird stolen. I miss JosÃ¨. RIP my robotic feathered friend. Donâ€™t download.ğŸ˜¡

attributes.review: one of the worst apps to exist, it took ages to install i was 18 when i tried to install this app iâ€™m now 50 years old when it finally downloaded so thanks for the waste of years of me waiting on my bed for this app to install, my dad is a big supporter of yours and i dont talk to him anymore because he says that this app told him he canâ€™t talk to his children because thatâ€™s what bigots do, anyways iâ€™m gonna go and reserve two tickets to your rally, but i have to walk my fish that day so i donâ€™t know if iâ€™m gonna make it, oh well, also this app has a button and when i clicked on it, it was a whistle for rats that only rats hear so now my house is invaded with rats doing random dances like if they were a cult, circling around my dogs and mumbling culty words like â€œwe are the bigotsâ€ and â€œwe hate allâ€ and when i called an exterminator to get rid of these cult rats, they ate the exterminator, poor bob may he rest in pieces :( he was a good man, had a family and was trying to do his job, why is this world so cruel on bob? he was a good guy, now his company â€˜bobs bugs be goneâ€™ is out of business and has to be shut down all because this app ;(
